acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Roxana McDonald Architectural Papers commenced and was completed in August 2001.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Roxana McDonald was born in Romania, where she did restoration work, before moving to Britain and completing post-graduate studies in Building Conservation. McDonald is a member of the Royal Institute of British Architects and does work in restoration specializing in the refurbishment of fireplaces. In 1984 she published "The Fireplace Book" (The Architectural Press: London), a book which explores the revival of the fireplace in the home, as well offering guidance to the conservationist as to how fireplaces and chimney's can be renewed.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of the research, drawings, working drafts, and illustrations for McDonald's book entitled "The Fireplace Book" published in 1984.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged by material type.
